title: Council Regulation (EC) No 1845/97 of 22 September 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 391/97 laying down, for 1997, certain measures for the conservation and management of fishery resources applicable to vessels flying the flag of Norway
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1845/97 of 22 September 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 391/97 laying down, for 1997, certain measures for the conservation and management of fishery resources applicable to vessels flying the flag of Norway
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: In Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 391/97, the entry dealing with the Norwegian catch quota for plaice shall be replaced by that appearing in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 September 1997.
For the Council
The President
F. BODEN
